page.title: 20One school day in my life
page.content: One school day in my life(Friday){ { ********************************* I get up at 7.00am and go down for breakfast. I have cereal,bacon and egg as well as toast.I go up and get washed ,then I let the rabbits out, collect my dinner money and leave at about 8.30am. I get to school at about 8.50am.The bell goes at 8.55am and we go to our classroom.The teacher takes the register,then we go to assembly where we have prayers and sing hymns. When we come out of assembly we do Maths until 10.30 when we have play- time.After we do English.At 11.45 we have lunch.On Friday we are 4th into cash-cafeteria.After lunch,at 1.00,we come in for a spelling test followed by PE.Break is at 2.15 till 2.30.When we come in we have tables then Art.We come out of school at 3.45pm. By Sarah Joynson.
